KANSAS STATE TEACHERS COLLEGE
REES H. HUGHES, PRESIDENT
PITTSBURG. KANSAS
PUBLIC RELATIONS OFFICE
Ray Vanderburg, Director
September 19, 1957
Dr* Harry Skornia
NAEB Headquarters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Enclosed you will find a copy of a letter I recently received
from Japan, I am enclosing also a copy of the letter I sent him.
It may be that by now he has contacted you relative to this inforÂ¬
mation, I do feel that perhaps much can be done in the nature
of an exchange program series and the NAEB network association*s
individual school stations.
Please let me know how things turh out.
Sincerely yours,
REF:rs
End,
